title: You Belong with Me
summary: "You Belong with Me" is a song by American singer-songwriter Taylor Swift, from her second studio album Fearless (2008). Swift wrote the song with Liz Rose and produced it with Nathan Chapman. She wrote "You Belong with Me" inspired by an argument between a male friend of hers and his girlfriend over the phone. A country pop song with elements of pop crossover, it is about an insecure protagonist's unrequited love for an out-of-reach love interest. Big Machine Records released "You Belong with Me" to radio as the second single from Fearless on April 18, 2009.
